version_description: Ft Laudertale Launch bug fixes
Bug fixes and performance improvements.

Bolt is live in Miami!

-Various Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements

-Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
-You can now rent multiple scooters on a single phone.
Please let us know what you think about this new feature by dropping us a line via the Help Chat button in-app or by writing us at support@boltof

-Various bug fixes and performance improvements.
-You can now temporarily lock a scooter during an ongoing ride.
Please let us know what you think about this new feature by dropping us a line via the Help Chat button in-app or by writing us at suppo

We are now Live in Miami (District 2).

- Various Bug fixes and performance Improvements

Bolt is live in Miami!

-Various Bug Fixes and Stability Improvements

- New markets in Nashville, Portland and Atlanta.
- Faster user experience.
- Bug Fixes

We love to hear from our riders. Please drop us a line by pressing the Help button in-app or emailing support@boltoffice.com.
